catalog_script_client.description: This script is auto created thorugh runtime module for checking application name.
catalog_script_client.name: Check AppName OnChange
catalog_script_client.script: function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) { if (isLoading || newValue == '') { return; } var portal_check; var portalgr = new GlideAjax('x_nuta2_nutanix_ca.Nutanix_ClientServerScriptBridge'); portalgr.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getPortalCompatibility'); portalgr.getXMLAnswer(getPortalCheck); function getPortalCheck(response) { portal_check = response; var name = newValue; if ((newValue.length != ((newValue.trim()).length)) || (!(/^[\_\-\w ]+$/.test(name) && (name.trim().lastIndexOf('-') != (name.trim().length - 1))))) { if(portal_check == 'false') g_form.clearValue('default_app_name'); else g_form.setValue('default_app_name', ''); g_form.showErrorBox('default_app_name', 'Only alphanumeric characters, underscores(_), hyphens(-) and in between spaces are allowed and cannot end with hyphens(-). Leading and trailing spaces are not allowed.'); } } }
